org.judal.storage.keyvalue

Interface BucketDataSource

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, DataSource

    public interface BucketDataSource
extends DataSource

    Interface for data sources providing key-value pairs

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Sergio Montoro Ten
